nastierSpecials.name: Squealing pack attack
nastierSpecials.effect: This creature gains +1 attack bonus per other dire rat engaged with the target it's attacking.

extraEffects.effect: The target also takes 1d3 ongoing acid damage.

abilities.name: Wall-crawler
abilities.effect: A giant ant can climb on ceilings and walls as easily as it moves on the ground.

attacks.name: Pincer
attacks.damage: 1 damage, and the scorpion gains a +2 attack bonus against the same target this turn with its stinger attack.

extraEffects.effect: 2/round, each requiring a quick action. (Hitting the same target twice with pincer gives the string attack a +4 bonus.)
The target also takes 2d6 ongoing poison damage if it's dazed or stuck.

attacks.name: Web
attacks.target: up to 2 nearby enemies in a group
attacks.damage: 3 damage, and the target is dazed until the end of the spider's next turn.

extraEffects.effect: The target is also stuck until the end of the spider's next turn.

abilities.name: Wall-crawler
abilities.effect: A giant web spider can climb on ceilings and walls as easily as it moves on the ground.

extraEffects.effect: The target also takes 1d8 ongoing poison damage.

abilities.name: Scuttle
abilities.effect: A hunting spider can turn its own failed disengage check into a success by taking 1d4 damage.

abilities.name: Wall-crawler
abilities.effect: A hunting spider can climb on ceilings and walls as easily as it moves on the ground.

extraEffects.effect: The fire boar can make a bash attack against a different target as a free action.

attacks.name: Bash
attacks.damage: The target is weakened (-4 to attacks and defences) until the end of the boar's next turn.

abilities.name: Bestial durability
abilities.effect: When an enemy's attack has an effect on the dire boar other than damage, the boar can roll and immediate hard save (16+); on a success, it negates that effect.

abilities.name: Last stand
abilities.effect: The board doesn't die until it reaches -60 hp.  While at 0 hp or below but more than -60 hp, it must roll a normal save at the end of each of its turns; on a failure it dies.

abilities.name: One random dire feature
abilities.effect: Use the dire features table or add something spicy.

nastierSpecials.name: Furious streak
nastierSpecials.effect: When the dire boar can make a bash attack, if it isn't engaged with a different enemy, as a free action it can pop free of the enemy engaged with it and mvoe to a nearby enemy to make that bash attack.
